subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Billy Butler’s skills do not match up well with the game the Royals tend to play, but his bat helped beat the Giants in Game 2, and it is hard to imagine the team without him.
snippet: Billy Butler’s skills do not match up well with the game the Royals tend to play, but his bat helped beat the Giants in Game 2, and it is hard to imagine the team without him.
